awards.text: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 11 wins & 4 nominations.

fullplot: Sonya is a German high school student who decides to write an essay about her town's history during the Third Reich and its resistance to it. To her dismay, and more so the town's, she uncovers instead definite collaboration during the period. As she digs deeper, she must struggle against the town's vocal and violent opposition to her search for the truth.
plot: When a young woman investigates her town's Nazi past, the community turns against her.
title: The Nasty Girl
